title: cytpoway121
author: cytpoway121
content: To everyone in crypto currency, the bear market is one market where fuds and panic triumph and reign which greatly affects the prices of crypto currency tokens, and yes some projects do not recover from the bear burdens.But do you know that the bear market is a blessing in disguise for every investors that is prepared and has been waiting for the dump ? So many tokens are going to touch lower lows, and if you are prepared, you can key into this tokens and more than double your money when the bull run is here. The dump is your friend, and is a blessing if you are always ready and prepared for it. Make sure to look into quality tokens and projects, and ofcourse dyor

The problem is stuff like that is only clear in hindsight so now at the moment you might think "wow 1 SOL for 18$ what a steal" but if we are at 10$ per SOL tomorrow then you have already lost almost 50% of your investment so the problem right now is, that we don't know if we go even lower than this. I personally think it could very well happen, but of course i am just as clueless as everyone else. Thanks CZ for causing this dump. He gets to buy FTX for cheap now and all the others lose a lot of money.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Be also wise in choosing what you will buy during this bear market. It's not a promise that almost everything will be up when the bull run market comes again.It doesn't go like that because there could be newbies that have that mindset into thinking that they'll earn as much as they can during the bull run but, it will depend on what they hold.Be wise at this time and it should really be the shopping spree time but with the right choice of cryptos that you should have.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I agree with you and I am not too bothered with the price right now. I have been picking up Bitcoin for years now and I try not to focus too much on the price. I think BTC as more of a longer term investment strategy. I don’t play the swings and definitely don’t sell my coins.BTC has been consistently making me money for many years now. I like buying it cheap but that’s not what motivates me, I’ve definitely bought when it’s higher too. What gets me pumped up is knowing that BTC is going to hit 100k in 2023.
